question.text: You arrive at a serious motorcycle crash. The motorcyclist is unconscious and bleeding. What should you do to help them?

explanation.text: Further collisions and fire are the main dangers immediately after a crash. If possible, get others to assist you and make the area safe. Help those involved and remember DR ABC (Danger, Response, Airway, Breathing, Compressions). This will help when dealing with any injuries.

answer.text: Take the numbers of other vehicles
